summary: Your tax returns are filled with sensitive personal and financial data—which you expect the IRS to protect. However, recent disclosures of sensitive taxpayer data have made headlines. We, and the Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration, have also raised concerns about IRS's ability to safeguard taxpayer information. In this review, we found weaknesses in training, information systems, contractor oversight, information-sharing, and more. Of the related...
title: Security of Taxpayer Information: IRS Needs to Address Critical Safeguard Weaknesses
